tags: based on that one line i posted a while ago
summary:
“i don’t need luck, i’ll be with dumbledore.”
harry speaks confidently to ron and hermione. their uncertain faces display fear...
body:
“i don’t need luck, i’ll be with dumbledore.”

harry speaks confidently to ron and hermione. their uncertain faces display fear that he will never make it back but harry’s face is glowing with pride and confidence. and perhaps he’s right! dumbledore is the only wizard that he-who-must-not-be-named ever feared, so perhaps it is dumbledore’s presence that will be the force that brings harry home again.

or, perhaps more likely, it is dumbledore’s presence that makes harry believe he will make it home—and that belief is what keeps him going.

perhaps the power that harry sees in dumbledore is the leftover strength from his youth combined with the reflection of harry’s own, because as dumbledore proves to be weak with age and with everything he passed catching up to him, harry is the one who proves to be strong—to be able to find his strength and power in the cold darkness, as he keeps telling his professor not to worry, that they will make it out, that he will get them home, and dumbledore whispers:

“i am not worried, harry. i am with you.”

or, perhaps more likely, it is dumbledore’s presence that makes harry believe he will make it home—and that belief is what keeps him going.

blog.name: fandomshatelgbtqpeople
blog.title: Fandoms Hate LGBTQ+ People
blog.description:
Our purpose at FHQP is to talk about the treatment of the LGBTQ+ community, both in media and in fandom. We aim to tackle fandom fetishization and all forms of hate and discrimination against characters and fans who are LGBTQIAP+. 
We will also post about celebrities who fall under these categories and real world issues we face.

summary:
Harry Potter fandom who became Avengers stan: 
Also, Marvel should've had someone from HP fanfiction beta read that whole...
body:
Harry Potter fandom who became Avengers stan:

Also, Marvel should’ve had someone from HP fanfiction beta read that whole timeheist thing. I’ve read fanfics that have plots sealed tighter than a saint’s asshole in ffn and Ao3 when it comes to timetravel and fix-its.

summary:
Draco: 

What the hell is that?

 Harry: What? Draco: That thing on your nose Harry: A septum piercing... Do... do you like it?...
body:
Draco:  What the hell is that?

Harry: What?

Draco: That thing on your nose

Harry: A septum piercing… Do… do you like it?

Draco: Damn, Potter, I love it

Inspired by rockmarina’s prompt list

summary: whenever harry wants to go out in public without being noticed, he recruits hermione to make him polyjuice potion. he has been...
body: whenever harry wants to go out in public without being noticed, he recruits hermione to make him polyjuice potion. he has been mistaken for a lesbian several times now for his passionate discussion of a certain hollyhead harpies player. he is slowly becoming known as the local lesbian quidditch cryptid. he doesn’t mind.
